message:
SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 30
©<Miembro Grupo>
31
OGSA-DAI
• OGSA-DAI is
– An extensible framework that allows to
– Access, integrate, transform and deliver
– Distributed and heterogeneous sources of data
• OGSA-DAI key elements are
– Resources (Data request execution resource, Data Resource)
– Activities (=operations or named unit of functionality)
• Activity connectors for connecting inputs and outputs of different activities
– Workflows (=composition of activities)
• Pipeline workflow (A set of chained activities executed in parallel with 
data flowing between the activities)
• Sequence workflow
• Parallel workflow
speaker: SYSTEM
